attributes.additional_details: Because it’s the right thing to do.
attributes.background: Look after the people of the U.K. before others.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Illegal immigrants are not entitled to receive any benefits. You can find out more here:

https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/sn05621/
https://fullfact.org/immigration/pensioners-or-refugees/
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
